name: LIVE HORROR
description:
How long can you survive, and put up a good show for your live viewers?

You are one of many contestants on a live broadcast on the hidden web. 
Equipped with nothing but a cheap camcorder, you have a simple goal: entertain, and escape the dank maze.
The better your performance, the more traction your broadcast will gain.

There will be plenty of death!
But on the bright side, each broadcast contributes to the wiki, where you can find out more about the mysteries of what surrounds you.

Unlock new ways to play!
Managed to escape? Challenge yourself with Hard Mode for a test of skill and persistence, or the Custom Difficulty Mode to experiment with deadly combinations, or unleash pure mayhem.

Will you make it to the top? Only one way to find out...

Controls:
WASD - Movement
Shift - Sprint
Esc - Settings Menu (In-game only)
F11 - Toggle Fullscreen
